title: Ticket #258: Support stduniv "file methods" in vanilla universe
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This change allows the use of stduniv-style "urls" by a condor_compiled binary when it is executing under vanilla universe. This, for example, allows for the use of the ckpt lib's compressed file support.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (9).
creator: gquinn
